00016 #ifndef B3_CONTACT4_H
00017 #define B3_CONTACT4_H
00018 
00019 #include "Bullet3Common/b3Vector3.h"
00020 #include "Bullet3Collision/NarrowPhaseCollision/shared/b3Contact4Data.h"
00021 
00022 B3_ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(struct) b3Contact4 : public b3Contact4Data
00023 {
00024         B3_DECLARE_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR();
00025 
00026         int getBodyA()const {return abs(m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit);}
00027         int getBodyB()const {return abs(m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit);}
00028         bool isBodyAFixed()const { return m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit<0;}
00029         bool isBodyBFixed()const { return m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit<0;}
00030         //      todo. make it safer
00031         int& getBatchIdx() { return m_batchIdx; }
00032         const int& getBatchIdx() const { return m_batchIdx; }
00033         float getRestituitionCoeff() const { return ((float)m_restituitionCoeffCmp/(float)0xffff); }
00034         void setRestituitionCoeff( float c ) { b3Assert( c >= 0.f && c <= 1.f ); m_restituitionCoeffCmp = (unsigned short)(c*0xffff); }
00035         float getFrictionCoeff() const { return ((float)m_frictionCoeffCmp/(float)0xffff); }
00036         void setFrictionCoeff( float c ) { b3Assert( c >= 0.f && c <= 1.f ); m_frictionCoeffCmp = (unsigned short)(c*0xffff); }
00037 
00038         //float& getNPoints() { return m_worldNormal[3]; }
00039         int getNPoints() const { return (int) m_worldNormalOnB.w; }
00040 
00041         float getPenetration(int idx) const { return m_worldPosB[idx].w; }
00042 
00043         bool isInvalid() const { return (getBodyA()==0 || getBodyB()==0); }
00044 };
00045 
00046 #endif //B3_CONTACT4_H
